alert.note: Alert for Gordon (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Murray, southeastern Whitfield and northern Gordon Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 801 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Tilton, or 9 miles north of Calhoun, moving southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Calhoun, Resaca, Redbud, Tilton, Nickelsville, North Georgia Speedway and Audubon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
